hotel:RoomRateDescription.Name: Room Cancellation Policy
hotel:RoomRateDescription.hotel:Text: Any cancellation received within 1 day prior to arrival date will incur the first night charge. Failure to arrive at your hotel will be treated as a No-Show and will incur the first night charge (Hotel policy).

hotel:HotelRateDetail.hotel:SupplementalRateInfo: Price includes:: Sales tax: 142.13 EUR. Fee: 0 EUR.

hotel:RoomRateDescription.Name: TotalReservationPrice Includes
hotel:RoomRateDescription.hotel:Text: The TotalReservationPrice includes taxes, surcharges and fees.

hotel:HotelDetailItem.Name: HotelCancellationPolicy
hotel:HotelDetailItem.hotel:Text: Unless specifically mentioned otherwise in the cancellation policy, cancellations received prior to the period(s) or dates(s) mentioned in the cancellation policy will incur a processing fee (per booking), dependent on the chosen currency and exchange rate at the time of booking. Any cancellations received after the cancellation due date specified in the confirmation email (including requests made within this period) are subject to a minimum of a 1 (ONE) night cancellation fee, unless you are notified otherwise in the confirmation email. The additional cancellation fee will NOT be charged in this case.

hotel:HotelDetailItem.Name: Hotel Description
hotel:HotelDetailItem.hotel:Text: Central Park Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in London. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like towels, carpeting, separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting London, Central Park Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.

hotel:HotelDetailItem.Name: Support Contact Details of Aggregator
hotel:HotelDetailItem.hotel:Text: +44 (0)20 3027 7900 CS@agoda.com On the Website / In booking confirmation mail http://www.agoda.com/info/contact_agoda.html
